geeting.label: Greetings, Industries Hyderabad Ohana!
geeting.description: We're delighted to present the very first issue of the Industries Cares newsletter. This issue recaps recent giving back activities by Industries Hyderabad and presents a glimpse of what's in store!

sections.title: What happened in the past few months?

activities.title: Tree Plantation
activities.description: We had 20 volunteers plant a 100 saplings to support our mission to plant for the planet and save our ecosystem!

activities.title: Lab Setup
activities.description: We set up 2x24 switches to accommodate up to 48 desktops and provide 2x the internet connection!

activities.title: Computer Classes
activities.description: Weekly programming basics classes to ~60 students from 9th grade. We will end the course with a hackathon!

action.description: Give what you can and change a child's life
action.label: Donate Now!

sections.title: What are we looking at ahead?

activities.title: Menstrual Care
activities.description: Create awareness about menstrual hygiene for girls. This helps in managing menstruation with safety and dignity using safe hygienic materials.

activities.title: Career Counselling
activities.description: Professional fulfillment lies at the intersection of what you love doing, what're you're good at, and what pays you well. We will be helping high school students at Jyothi Vidyalaya find this sweet spot as they prepare for their future.

activities.title: Diwali Activities
activities.description: This Diwali, we are conducting a slew of exciting activities with children of all classes (LKG to 10th)!

action.description: Interested in volunteering for any of these?
action.label: Sign Up Now!

footer.title: Got questions?
footer.description: And if you havenâ€™t already, be sure to join the group and set your notification preference to Every Post, so you never miss out on any updates.
